results.name: Walk While My Grandmother Plays The Piano

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18+
  • Processor: Core i3 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics or above
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: System Sound Card

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics or above
  • DirectX: Version 11

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 (4 * 3200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4096 VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 (8 * 3400) or equivalent
